text: MJ & Friends were two stadium concerts that took place in 1999 featuring the legendary pop icon Michael Jackson along with several other artists. The concert was organized to raise funds for the needy and promote various charitable causes. The first one was held in Seoul, South Korea on June 25 (exactly one decade before his death) and the second one was in Munich, Germany; and showcased several notable performances by Jackson and his special guests, which included prominent musicians and entertainers. The concert is remembered not just for its star-studded lineup but also for highlighting Jackson's commitment to philanthropy and his ability to bring together diverse talent for a meaningful cause.
title: MJ & Friends
